actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 11:00 a.m. on March 17, 2023.

actions-list.header: Board of Visitors to the United States Merchant Marine Academy
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to 46 U.S.C. 51312(b), and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following member of the House to the Board of Visitors to the United States Merchant Marine Academy: Mr. Valadao.

actions-list.header: Board of Visitors to the United Stated Naval Academy
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to 10 U.S.C. 8468(a), and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Board of Visitors to the United Stated Naval Academy: Mr. Ellzey and Mr. C. Scott Franklin of Florida.

Pursuant to section 4(b) of House Resolution 5, 118th Congress, and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the House Democracy Partnership: Mr. Smith of Nebraska, Mr. LaHood, Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania, Mr. Dunn of Florida, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Kustoff, Mr. Hern, Mr. Steil, Ms. Tenney and Mrs. Luna.

actions-list.header: Board of Trustees of the John. F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to section 2(a) of the National Cultural Center Act (20 U.S.C. 76h(a)), amended by Public Law 107-117, and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Board of Trustees of the John. F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts: Mr. McCaul and Ms. Letlow.
The House received a message from the Senate. The Senate passed S. 758.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Robert J. Wittman to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
